Subject: clear the disk space asap
Description: Your appliance is running low on disk space, there is 17.07 gb free available from 139.11 gb (12%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support.
What_We_Know__c:
22.04
- the customer is having disk space issues
- I asked for their approval to check and clear the logs and what else can be deleted - I received it
- I asked for access to their backend, since their server is hosted by us
- cleared some space from backups
- they have over 30 million logs, 10 million out of those from unidentified file types
- advised the customer to run an audit log backup to further free up some space, and go over their monitoring needs in order to reduce the number of logs
- scheduled a remote session with the customer to help them with this

RS:
- disabled file tracing and file shadowing - the customer allowed us to delete the old shadows
- removes a lot of unnecessary options from CAP policies
- scheduled an audit log backup to run every 2 weeks
Next_Steps__c:
22.04
- waiting to clear the disk space
- tell the customer what to do to avoid having this issue so frequently

- waiting on the customer after providing instructions

- waiting on RS
Solution_Comment__c:
- cleared backups and shadows
- we optimised the CAP policies
- disabled file tracing and shadowing
- scheduled an audit log backup to run every 2 weeks
